member.name: T:StreetSmart.Common.Factories.DomElementFactory
member.summary: Factory that creates a dom element where inside the api runs.

member.name: M:StreetSmart.Common.Factories.DomElementFactory.Create
member.returns: Represents a dom element.

member.name: M:StreetSmart.Common.Factories.DomElementFactory.Create(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a dom element with a width and height in percents and a top and a left in pixels
member.example:
This sample shows how to use the method.
// Create a dom element int width = 75; // width in percents int height = 75; // height in percents int top = 50; // 50 pixels from top int left = 50; // 50 pixels from left IDomElement element = DomElementFactory.Create(width, height, top, left);
member.returns: Represents a dom element.

member.summary: returns JSon object, which contains the specified properties

member.summary: Triggers when the loaded panorama is altered.

member.summary: Triggers when a recording is clicked inside the PanoramaViewer.

member.summary: Triggers when one or more tiles could not be loaded.

member.summary: Triggers when time travel date is changed

member.summary: Rotates the panorama horizontally by a certain amount, as if the camera is turning to the right.
member.param: Amount to rotate the image, in degrees.

member.name: M:StreetSmart.Common.Interfaces.API.IPanoramaViewer.RotateUp(System.Double)
member.summary: Rotates the panorama vertically by a certain amount, as if the camera is turning to the sky.
member.param: Amount to rotate the image, in degrees.

member.param: Orientation object that contains values to change.

The layerId to which the feature is selected

member.summary: API used to use and modify various StreetSmart components.

member.name: E:StreetSmart.Common.Interfaces.API.IStreetSmartAPI.APIReady
member.summary: Triggers when the frame is loaded. After this trigger, you can login in the the API.

member.name: M:StreetSmart.Common.Interfaces.API.IStreetSmartAPI.Init(StreetSmart.Common.Interfaces.Data.IOptions)

member.returns: Asynchronous function

member.name: M:StreetSmart.Common.Interfaces.API.IStreetSmartAPI.Open(System.String,StreetSmart.Common.Interfaces.Data.IViewerOptions)
member.summary: Open a panorama and/or oblique viewer using a query. The query can be a coordinate, an extent, an address or a panorama/oblique ID.

viewer options for open the panoramic image
member.exception: Thrown when no image is found
member.returns: Asynchronous function, A list of opened viewers
